longMSG:
You are in the LIVING ROOM. Music is playing from somewhere.
There is a SOFA and a CONSOLE TABLE.
You may go NORTH to HALLWAY1, EAST to the BAR LOUNGE, SOUTHEAST to the GARAGE, SOUTH to the COURTYARD, or WEST to the DINING ROOM.
shortMSG:
You are in the LIVING ROOM on the 1st floor.
Features: SOFA, CONSOLE TABLE
Areas you may go to:
NORTH/HALLWAY1
EAST/BAR LOUNGE
SOUTHEAST/GARAGE
SOUTH/COURTYARD
WEST/DINING ROOM
